page.title: 19A Visit to India
page.content: A trip to India is being organised by West Buckland School.Six pupils and two adults are going in the summer of 1985.They are going for five and a half weeks.Money has been raised by the school in various ways. National firms have been asked to sponsor their trip in exchange for a free copy of the book that will be published about the visit.There have been donations from the Old Boys' Association.In the spring all the pupils at the school were given full sweet tubes and were asked to return them full of coins.Over Â£860 was raised.A Physics master is doing a sponsored parachute jump to raise extra funds. The adventurers are going to visit the states south of Bombay and help with development projects.
